name: Mixed Time
description:
Mixed time is the product of a genre mix of Platformer and Time Travelling.

!!!!!FOR WEB BUILD!!!!! ------> Walljump tutorial: https://streamable.com/t7xgd9

In this game you use the 1, 2 and 3 keys to swap between time spaces(past, present and future) and platform through said time spaces. It proves to be quite challenging at points(at least that's what I think). So, good luck!

Genres: Platformer / Time Travelling
